code: import React from'react';import{Button}from'reactstrap';import{useChat}from'../contexts/ChatContext';import{useGroup}from'../contexts/GroupContext';import Swal from'sweetalert2';var ChangeGroupNameButton=function ChangeGroupNameButton(_ref){var newGroupName=_ref.newGroupName,setGroupName=_ref.setGroupName,actualMembers=_ref.actualMembers;var _useChat=useChat(),activeChat=_useChat.activeChat;var _useGroup=useGroup(),setChangeGroupData=_useGroup.setChangeGroupData;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Button,{color:"none",type:"button",onClick:function onClick(){return Swal.fire({title:"Do you want to change the group name?",text:newGroupName,icon:"warning",showCancelButton:true,confirmButtonColor:"#3085d6",cancelButtonColor:"#d33",confirmButtonText:"Yes!"}).then(function(result){if(result.isConfirmed){Swal.fire("Changed!","","success");setChangeGroupData({groupId:activeChat.groupId,groupName:newGroupName,members:actualMembers,description:"Descrição do grupo!"});setGroupName("");}else{setGroupName("");}});}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("i",{className:"ri-edit-line"}));};export default ChangeGroupNameButton;
